page.title: 16ALLESLEY HALL cont.
page.content:
In 1938 Lord Iliffe gave the hall and its grounds to Coventry Corporation since when it has been used as a convalescent home and an orthopaedic hospital.
The hall at present is used by the Leisure Services Department and the grounds are used as a public park and an approach golf course. There is great concern in the area at the present time as the Council are known to have plans to sell the hall and the residents of Allesley Park have worries with regards to the ammenities which may be taken away from them and the use to which the hall may now be put.
